912f032444cd3d2ce19c4c095cc4a84aab23a680f13cc0a4c5","dweb:/ipfs/QmYEU2A4bMt8e8CJNMncentoJssEsZBRHftnyuZQffPEtb"]}},"version":1}

changeVaultFactoryOwner(address).details: this function is used to tranfer ownership and all roles from one account to another while also removing all permissions on the previous account

contractType().details: this function shows the type of the contract

returns._0: contractType the contract type in string

createVault(address,address,string,bool).details: this function is used to create a vault and takes a native token payment of a specified amount which can be viewed using the creationFee function

params.projectOwner: the address of the owner and admin of the vault baing created
params.rewardToken: the address of the erc20 token to reward users with
params.useTokenForPayment: use token for payment instead of eth

returns.vault: the address of the created vault

creationFee().details: this function is used to check the current vault creation fee in eth

returns.erc20Fee: the creation fee value in ERC20 Token
returns.ethFee: the creation fee value in ETH/Native Token

erc20PaymentToken().details: this function allows one to view the current erc20 payment token used in vault creation which is also an option aside from using the ETH/Native Token

feeReceiver().details: this function is used to check the fee receiver the factory is currently using

returns._0: feeReceiver the address where the vault creation payments will be sent to

getImplementationDetails().details: this function is used to check the current vault implementation details

returns._contractType: the contract type of the implementation
returns.implementationAddress: the vault implementation the factory is currently using

getVaultInfo(address).details: this fuction is used to check the vault's info stored in the registry

returns._0: vaultInfo the vault information stored in te factory

grantPermit(address).details: used to grant permision for selected (onlyRole Restricted) functions to the controller

isController(address).details: used to check if an address is a controller or has a controller access

owner().details: this function is used to check who the current owner of the factory is

revokePermit(address).details: used to grant permision for selected (onlyRole Restricted) functions to the controller

setERC20PaymentToken(address).details: this function is used to update the erc20 payment token used to pay for the vault creation

setFeeReceiver(address).details: this function is used to update the fee receiver on the factory

totalVaults().details: this function is used to check the total amount of vaults created by the factory

returns._0: totalVaults the amount of vaults currently created by the factory

updateCreationFee(uint256,uint256).details: this function is used to update the vault creation fee the users needed to pay to create a new vault

params.newCreationFee: the new creation fee that users need to pay to create a vault in ETH
params.newERC20CreationFee: the new creation fee for ERC20 token payment that users need to pay to create a vault in ETH

updateImplementation(address).details: this function is used to update the vault implementation used in creating new vaults

params.newImplementation: the address of the new vault implementation

updateVaultInfo(address).details: this function is used to sync the info from the vault to the factory and can only be accessed by the owner of the vault and the factory owner/controller

params.vault: the vault address that is in the factory's registry

version().details: this function shows the current version of the contract

returns._0: version the contract version in semver format x.x.x
